title: Urban-Style 1x1 In The 💓 Of South Lake Union
map_address: 1146 Harrison Street near Fairview Ave N
posting_body: Inspired by the local culture, history and community of South Lake Union, Marlowe offers elements of history in a modern environment.
Nostalgic, one-of-a-kind touches sit alongside eco-friendly, future-forward conveniences, creating an environment that is refreshing and sophisticated.
Feel right at home as wooden waves ripple through our lobby and know you’ve found the right place.
Marlowe’s beautiful apartment homes have been custom crafted to reduce the barrier between indoors and outdoors, connecting you organically to the energetic neighborhood around you.
Whether you’re a disruptor, a dream-maker, a tech giant, or a marketing wizard, Marlowe offers you a home to love in, work in, play in and grow in.
This is the place to be as you ply your craft and change the world.
We are now offering virtual tours and self-guided and touchless tours by appointment only.
Use the link below for more details:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 583 Sq.
- Tile bath surrounds with oversized soaking tubs
- Quartz countertops with subway tile backsplash
- Lush landscaped courtyards including green roof area
- Rooftop deck with BBQs and lounge seating
- Resident lounge with bar and game area
- Pet relief area with wash-down system
Pet rent is $35 per cat and $50 per dog.
We do not have a weight limit.
Please call for complete pet policy information.
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
